Enjoy the Bold Flavor of Palm Beach Coffee.

Brewed fresh everyday for your enjoyment.

Established in 2024, Palm Beach Coffee House strives to create the perfect cup of coffee for all our customers and bring a smile to their face.

Serving Our Community Since 2024

Welcome to Palm Beach Coffee, where every cup tells a story! Nestled in the heart of downtown, our specialty coffee house is dedicated to crafting the perfect brew, sourced from the finest beans around the globe. Each drink is meticulously prepared by our skilled baristas, who are passionate about the art of coffee. At Palm Beach Coffee, we believe in sustainability and support small-scale farmers through direct trade practices.

Our menu features a variety of single-origin coffees, artisanal blends, and ivocative seasonal specialties, ensuring there’s something for every palate.

Join us in our cozy, inviting space, complete with local art and a community vibe. Whether you’re grabbing a quick espresso on your way to work or settling in for a leisurely afternoon with a pour-over, we’re here to awaken your senses and elevate your coffee experience. Come sip, savor, and discover your new favorite brew!

Signature Blends

Velvet Mocha Bliss

Indulge in a luxurious blend of rich espresso, velvety dark chocolate, and steamed milk, topped with a sprinkle of cocoa and a dollop of whipped cream. Perfect for those who crave a little extra sweetness in their day.

Price: $5.25

Caramel Cloud Latte

This dreamy latte features espresso swirled with smooth caramel sauce and creamy milk, finished with a cloud of foam and a drizzle of caramel on top. A delightful treat that’s as comforting as a warm hug!

Price: $4.75

Berry Bliss Nitro Brew

Experience the fruity explosion of our Berry Bliss Nitro Brew! Infused with berry puree and served cold, this nitrogen-infused coffee is creamy and effervescent, making it a unique choice for coffee lovers looking for something different.

Price: $5.25

Lavender Latte Love

Savor the floral notes of our Lavender Latte, where creamy steamed milk meets espresso and lavender syrup, topped with a delicate lavender sprig.

Price: $5.25
